name: Espresso
details: A classic Italian coffee brewed by forcing a small amount of nearly boiling water through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Cappuccino
details: A popular coffee made with espresso, steamed milk, and topped with milk foam.

name: Latte
details: A creamy coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk.

name: Mocha
details: A delicious combination of coffee, chocolate, and steamed milk.

name: Americano
details: A simple coffee made by adding hot water to espresso.

name: Macchiato
details: An espresso with a small amount of foamed milk.

name: Flat White
details: An espresso-based drink with a higher ratio of coffee to milk.

name: Cold Brew
details: Coffee steeped in cold water for an extended period for a smoother taste.
